summary: To help improve the United States' manufacturing competitiveness, the Departments of Commerce, Defense, and Energy provided $1.7 billion for Manufacturing USA—a network of 16 advanced manufacturing institutes. The institutes engage their members—including academic institutions and companies—to promote advanced manufacturing. Many institutes reported progress on their goals to advance technologies and manufacturing processes. Members say they're satisfied with their involvement. While some of our prior recommendations...
title: Advanced Manufacturing: Innovation Institutes Report Technology Progress and Members Report Satisfaction with Their Involvement
